entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
